snippet: Any budget deal requiring Democratic help risks alienating some Republicans — the very scenario that so often vexed the Speaker Paul D. Ryan’s predecessor.
abstract: Carl Hulse On Washington column notes Congress needs to clear government funding bill by Dec 11 to avoid shutdown; holds Speaker Paul D Ryan must construct plan that can win over Democrats without alienating Republicans, goal that often eluded predecessor John A Boehner.
lead_paragraph: Any budget deal requiring Democratic help risks alienating some Republicans — the very scenario that so often vexed the Speaker Paul D. Ryan’s predecessor.

headline.main: As a Deadline Looms, Paul Ryan Finds Himself in a Boehner-Like Spot
headline.print_headline: As a Deadline Looms, Ryan Finds Himself in a Boehner-Like Spot
